resources.string: Hello there, the user of our amazing BMI calculator based on the information you have provided us we are pleased to inform you that you have a NORMAL body mass Index. We encourage you to continue with this trend and exercise well. \n Cheers!!

Hello there, the user of our amazing BMI calculator based on the information you have provided us we are pleased to inform you that you have an UNDERWEIGHT body mass Index. We encourage you to eat more and add some more weight. \n Cheers!!

Hello there, the user of our amazing BMI calculator based on the information you have provided us we are pleased to inform you that you have a OVERWEIGHT body mass Index. We encourage you to workout well to be able to balance things up. \n Cheers!!
